_header: Saint Justina of high men in Antioch come
Subjects: saints’ lives; Justina, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Justina in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Seyn Iustine of heie men In antioch comWel ȝong heo louede on
                    ihesu crist & turnde to cristendom…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou Ihesu uor þe suete loue of þe maide
                    Iustine& vor þe loue of ciprian schulde ous fram helle
                    pyne

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint istine of hyȝe men in antioche comWel ȝong ȝhe
                    louid Ihesu crist & tok to cristindom…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesis for þe swete loue of þe mayde
                    iustine& for þe lour of sein siprian scheld vs fram helle
                    pyne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEynt Iustine of heiȝe Men in Antioche comWel ȝong heo
                    louede Ihesu crist and tok to cristendom…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for þat swete loue of þe Mayden IustineAnd
                    for þe loue of seint Ciprian schild us from helle pyne. Amen
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Justine of heye men in Antyoche comWel ȝong ȝeo
                    louede Ihesu crist and tok to cristendom…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu ffor þe loue of þe swete mayde IustineAnd
                    ffor þe loue of Seint Ciprian schulde vs ffram helle pyne

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Iustine of heie men in antioche comwel ȝong heo loueþe ihesu crist & torneþe to cristendom…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou ihesu for þe suete loue of þe maide Iustine& for þe loue of ciprian schulde ous fro helle pyne
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxi” added to right margin by later hand (f. 135).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Iustine of heiȝe men in antioche comWel ȝong heo louede ihesu crist & tok to cristendom…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now ihesu vor þe swete loue of þe maide IustineAnd vor þe loue of seint cyprian schilde vs vrom helle pine
